item.title: Cisco ACI â€“ AVS Upgrade through CLI
item.description: First grab the release from the cisco page here Then put it through scp from you Download place to the ESX Server 1 2 3 scp CiscoAVS_1.5-5.2.1.SV3.1.5-pkg.zip root@10.32.5.150:/tmp Password: CiscoAVS_1.5-5.2.1.SV3.1.5-pkg.zip 100% 35MB 806.2KB/s 00:45 Next you Login to the ESX through SSH and check the current version 1 2 3 4 ~ # vemcmd show version VEM Version: 5.2.1.3.1.3.0-3.2.1 System Version: VMware ESXi 5.5.0 Releasebuild-2068190 ESX Version Update Level: 0 Then i unzipped the archives and upgraded the vib
